thread.title: Entry-Level Finance Specialist at Premier Staffing (San Francisco, CA)
thread.title_full: Entry-Level Finance Specialist at Premier Staffing (San Francisco, CA)

title: Entry-Level Finance Specialist at Premier Staffing (San Francisco, CA)
text: Source: Glass Door Are you looking for a opportunity with a rapidly growing San Francisco start-up? If so, we'd love to hear from you! Our client takes a different approach to personal lending and credit, and is seeking awesome entry-level candidates with 1-3 years of experience in banking, loan processing, underwriting, and other finance-related positions. Responsibilities May Include: - Review financial documents: conducting document review - Evaluate/review applicants information - Guide clients through application process - Assist with preparing status reports and utility of performance metrics - Track, document and communicate progression of tasks and provide follow-up to ensure on-time completion Qualifications: -Previous finance internship and/or work experience is preferred -Strong communication skills, great writing skills/grammar -Must be detail-oriented with the ability to multi-task -Enjoys working in a fast paced changing environment -Demonstrated, take-charge attitude Additional Details: - This is a contract/contract-to-hire position, with hourly rates depending on experience (ranging from $17-$25 per hour) -candidates will only be considered if currently living in the San Francisco Bay area, and are available immediately Interested? Please register and apply below for consideration. *Pursuant to the SF Fair Chance Ordinance we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrests and conviction records.* premierstaff
